A fantastic young family home, come see for yourself.

Description:
Side access + 3 living zones on 800m2 block
PARK AVENUE ESTATE SUPER HOME ---- EPIC, mind blowing, stunning & luxurious are just some of the words to describe 65 Kingdom Drive, Cranbourne. This amazing modern HOME sits on a massive 800sqm allotment (25m frontage) and offers more than enough room for your family, your toys and your hobbies.

- Spacious Master suite with separate his AND her's walk in robes plus full en-suite with oversized shower, twin basin vanities and bath.
- Four further generous bedrooms – three with BIR's and the fourth being a bedroom/ study.
